value:
I hope to truly master the
sword...but something might
be throwing off my hand.$k$pMaybe if I...steadied myself
around women, that would
do the trick.

Before becoming a Shepherd, I was
right hand to Basilio, West-Khan
of Regna Ferox.

If you are too busy, I can patrol in
your stead.

Would you care to spar? If you
have no combat training, you could
always throw rocks at me.

I was just sharpening my sword.
If it won't work when I need it,
then that will be the end of me.

I think you're the one I was
sent here to find. You know
$Nf, yes?$k$pI'm here to deliver a hello. Now
that I have, I will leave.

This is only the start of what
I can do.
...Good.

The path to mastering the
sword is a lonely one.

Being granted power instead of
slowly earning it...isn't so bad.

I'm Lon'qu, a swordsman from
Regna Ferox. And...that's all
there is to know about me.

You're here again. Why? What
have I done to deserve this
attention?$k$pI have no wealth, no power.
Nothing but my skills as a
swordsman.$k$pWhat? You value my presence?
You find my help...reassuring?$k$pNo one has ever said that to
me before, but I am glad my
presence gives you strength.$k$pUnderstood. I shall be your
bodyguard, then.$k$pI will stay by your side for as long
as you want me.
はっ！
せいっ！
くっ…！
Damn...
No hard feelings.
Be silent!
You're no challenge.
Give up.
Heh.
I, um, have trouble speaking to women.
Did you need something?
You're distracting me from my training.
Before coming here, I was the West-Khan's right-hand man...
Don't come to me for conversation.
The path to mastering the sword is a lonely one...
Why would you want to talk to me?
Yes.
Let's go.
Orders?
